title: OCS Account flagged
body:
I was asked to play toplane for OCS team legion. But apparently my manager said I wouldn't  be able to play because my account was flagged.

This is news to me, since ive never had any bans / warnings or anything. I even competed  in OCS last year.

Could someone from riot please shed a light or help me with this situation? and if my account is flagged how long would I have to wait till I can play competitive. 

Thank you

replies.body:
>playing for LCS

ah here, found your problem

Send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) to ask about it, as Riot don't discuss account specific things on the boards. 

Good luck ♥

1. How does your manager know your account if flagged?
2. Why don't they know for how long?
